Package player

Class ChatApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.ChatApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ChatApp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This Class paints the player's Chat window in the JavaFx UI
    Author:
    DigitalVilla
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
